item.source: 317 pi, item requirements for a quest not working

item.title: 317 pi, item requirements for a quest not working
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“jwags, post:1, topic:427241”]ok so i built a quest, but for one part u need certain items. in action handler i put

if (c.NYProgress == 3 && c.getItems().hasAllNYProgress()) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(128, npcType); }

the c.NYProgress is correct and works fine, but the hasAllNYProgress does not work. you need basically 4 logs and 7 beers.

so i called it in itemAssistant
this is what it was

public boolean hasAllNYProgress() { return playerHasItem(1512,4) && playerHasItem(1917,7); }

so if i have the items, i go to the npc. it doesnt register as having them and doesnt send me to dialogue 128

this is dialogue 128 from dialoguehandler

case 128: sendNpcChat4(" ","Finally!!! Here..."," "," ", c.talkingNpc, " Sam"); c.getItems().deleteItem(1512, 4); c.getItems().deleteItem(1917, 7); c.getItems().addItem(1913, 1); c.nextChat = 0; c.NYProgress = 4;
thanks[/quote]

Change your return to:

return true;

Declare the boolean you made as false by default.

Then just add a condition for your NPC.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 pi, item requirements for a quest not working

item.title: 317 pi, item requirements for a quest not working
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

To get it to work for now just use

if (c.NYProgress == 3 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(1917, 7) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(1512, 4))) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(128, npcType); } else { c.getDH().sendDialogues(129, npcType); }

case 128: sendNpcChat4(" ","Finally!!! Here..."," "," ", c.talkingNpc, " Sam"); c.getItems().deleteItem(1512, 4); c.getItems().deleteItem(1917, 7); c.getItems().addItem(1913, 1); c.nextChat = 0; c.NYProgress = 4; break;

case 129: sendNpcChat4(" ","I still need my items!"," "," ", c.talkingNpc, " Sam"); c.nextChat = 0; break;

Try that, just a rough guess.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 pi, item requirements for a quest not working
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

ok so i built a quest, but for one part u need certain items. in action handler i put

if (c.NYProgress == 3 && c.getItems().hasAllNYProgress()) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(128, npcType); }

the c.NYProgress is correct and works fine, but the hasAllNYProgress does not work. you need basically 4 logs and 7 beers.

so i called it in itemAssistant
this is what it was

public boolean hasAllNYProgress() { return playerHasItem(1512,4) && playerHasItem(1917,7); }

so if i have the items, i go to the npc. it doesnt register as having them and doesnt send me to dialogue 128

this is dialogue 128 from dialoguehandler

case 128: sendNpcChat4(" ","Finally!!! Here..."," "," ", c.talkingNpc, " Sam"); c.getItems().deleteItem(1512, 4); c.getItems().deleteItem(1917, 7); c.getItems().addItem(1913, 1); c.nextChat = 0; c.NYProgress = 4;
thanks
